title: Podcast Episode 34.2 – SPECIAL EDITION
description:
Today on the podcast,
we are playing a sneak peek of the audiobook FIX HER UP by New York Times
Bestselling Author Tessa Bailey! Narrated by Charlotte North. 



TOTAL
SURRENDER by Erika Wilde: https://amzn.to/2L3dSZl



FIX HER UP by Tessa Bailey: 



Audiobook: https://amzn.to/2WOJUzw



Amazon US: https://amzn.to/2yTFj18



Paperback: https://amzn.to/2E7Oqzi



Amazon UK: https://amzn.to/2Rz601V



Amazon CA: https://amzn.to/2JHefG



B&N: https://bit.ly/2Dn9G3F



iTunes: https://apple.co/2SJgTzw



Kobo: https://bit.ly/2qw64DW



Podcast CreditsRead Me Romance Theme Song by L.B. Ballard https://m.facebook.com/lbballardmusic/Podcast Production by Lola
